name: Aloft (Treugolnick, Mister Vanchik)
description:
Hey! You have arrived at the Aloft game page. The game was made in 7 days on Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. 

- Mr. Vanchik (team motivator. And also a programmer, He also made sounds) 

-Triangular (Artist, programmer) 

-glesorty (Musician) 

And with this team of 3 people we started creating a game. The essence of the game: We acted in accordance with the rule "Fun game for the company", so we decided to make multiplayer in the game. 

Unfortunately, this doesn't work very well. Probably due to the wrong choice of resource. 

As a result, 1.5 days before the end of the jam, Unity broke down and had to redo the game almost from scratch:_(

But we don't get upset. We made a pretty beautiful and high-quality toy. Good game) 

Good luck to you!
